paleval 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

ggplot for HCL data on series of hex-colors

Source: R/bloom-gg.R
pev_gg_bloom.Rd

Create a plot like Tableau made here.

pev_gg_bloom(data_bloom, label = FALSE, max_chroma = NULL)

pev_gg_bloom_target(data_bloom, label = FALSE, max_chroma = 200)

pev_gg_bloom_lum(data_bloom, label = FALSE)

Arguments

data_bloom

data.frame created using pev_data_bloom.
label

logical indicates to use axes labels, titles, etc.
max_chroma

numeric upper-limit for the chroma scale

Examples

  # without color-vision deficiency, with labels
  data_no_cvd <- pev_data_bloom("Viridis", include_cvd = FALSE)
  pev_gg_bloom(data_no_cvd, label = TRUE)

  # without color-vision deficiency, without labels
  pev_data_bloom("Viridis") %>% pev_gg_bloom()

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Examples
